title: GTO's - Permanent Damage (1969)
description:
AH! Here&#039;s a pretty rare artifact of the late 60s groupie musicians scene! Who&#039;da thunk that the musicians of the bands were GROUPIES?! How does that work!? Paradox much? Anyway, this is an odd selection of wacked out conversations between groupies, demented ditties, and of course pedo-curious, (probably acid-and-x-induced!!!) "love stories" from The Girls Together Outrageously that was  brought into being by none other than Frank Zappa!!! He even played tambourine on this record. The group consisted of 5 groupies that collected around the Mothers/Zappa/LA Rock n Roll Scene from the late 60s and "fronted" by Miss Pamela Des Barres- Famous groupie and rock journalist! Many other pretty famous musicians were on here too. Including the likes of RY COODER, ROD STEWART, AND EVEN JEFF BECK!!!! Holy Hannah! So, I&#039;ll let you guys judge this "music"! Be sure to leave feedback on here please! I have Pamela&#039;s audio book if you&#039;d like as well?

Thanks to Bill for reminding me about this!


Permanent Damage (LP)
The GTO&#039;s

Released: December 8, 1969
Label: Straight
Catalog Number: STS 1059
Produced by Frank Zappa

Tracklisting:
1. The Eureka Springs Garbage Lady (3:47)
2. Miss Pamela and Miss Sparky discuss STUFFED BRAS and some of their early gym class experiences (2:10)
3. Who&#039;s Jim Sox? (0:18)
4. Kansas and the BTO&#039;s (1:12)
5. The Captain&#039;s Fat Theresa Shoes (1:56)
6. Wouldn&#039;t It Be Sad If There Were No Cones? (1:11)
7. Do Me In Once And I&#039;ll Be Sad, Do Me In Twice And I&#039;ll Know Better (Circular Circulation) (2:19)
8. The Moche Monster (1:46)
9. TV Lives (1:03)
10. Rodney (3:42)
11. I Have A Paintbrush In My Hand To Color A Triangle (2:11)
12. Miss Christine&#039;s First Conversation With The Plaster Casters Of Chicago (0:57)
13. The Original GTO&#039;s (1:05)
14. The Ghost Chained To The Past, Present, And Future (Shock Treatment) (1:45)
15. Love On An Eleven Year Old Level (1:18)
16. Miss Pamela&#039;s First Conversation With The Plaster Casters Of Chicago (1:31)
17. I&#039;m In Love With The Ooo-Ooo Man (3:27)

31 Minutes, MP3- 192 Kb/s

Musicians:
[GTO&#039;s]
Miss Christine--Vocals
Miss Cinderella--Vocals
Miss Mercy--Vocals
Miss Pamela--Vocals
Miss Sandra--Vocals
[Mothers]
Ian Underwood--Keyboards (1, 5, 14, 17)
Don Preston--Synthesizer (9)
Roy Estrada--Bass (1, 5, 14, 17)
Jimmy Carl Black--Drums (1, 5, 14, 17)
Frank Zappa--Tambourine (17)
Nicky Hopkins--Keyboards (14)
Craig Doerge--Keyboards (1, 5, 14, 17)
[Others]
Jeff Beck--Guitar (1, 14)
Rod Stewart--Vocals (14)
Rodney Bingenheimer--vocals (10)
Lowell George (7, 11)
Russ Titleman (7, 11)
Ry Cooder--guitar (11)
